#McLaughlin says that #Venezuela is not getting enough attention - on verge of meltdown. #HASC
#McLaughlin highlights the fact that the majority of refugees flowing into Europe come from sub-Saharan Africa, not MENA #HASC
#Petraeus says he thinks we're in for some "rocky seas" in regards to the Philippines. #HASC
.@RepMcEachin asks how we can keep Philippines in our orbit, given rise of #Duterte #HASC
#McLaughlin says we need to keep sanctions in place on #Russia, especially given their violation of nations' borders #HASC
#McLaughlin questions @Liz_Cheney's characterization of #JCPOA - says he's confident we can detect cheating. #HASC
#Petraeus says that we need a "sustained commitment" to Afghanistan. #HASC
#McLaughlin: We need to "tend the garden" of our #NATO allies - #Putin is trying to invade our garden. #HASC
.@Rep_Hunter makes subtle dig at #Trump's alarming rhetoric in regards to #NATO. #HASC
#McLaughlin: U.S. needs to pay more attention to our polices of strategic communication with the world. #HASC
#Petraeus says we have competition for foreign talent. "If you fly into Canada, they have signs -'can't get H1-B visa? Try here!" #HASC
.@RepSheaPorter reiterates #Petraeus's comment that our society's openness is strategic advantage - helps us attract best & brightest #HASC
.@sethmoulton says that #MuslimBan does not pass #Petraeus's test of "taking more bad guys off the battlefield than it puts on" #HASC
#McLaughlin: Says "don't make the assumption" that there will be uprising in Russia against #Putin #HASC
#Petraeus emphasizes there is a need to revise #AUMF #HASC
#Petraeus says that extremists' interpretations are "twisted and tortured." Refutes @RepMoBrooks contention that Koran is to blame #HASC
.@RepMoBrooks engaging in blatant Islamophobia in this hearing. #HASC
#Petraeus says that Muslims are "critical" to fight against #ISIS #HASC
#Petraeus says that we shouldn't stoop to #ISIS's level when it comes to torture. #HASC
#Petraeus condemns torture - is "wrong and doesn't work." Need to establish relationships with detainees, not abuse them. #HASC
#McLaughlin says #MuslimBan shows that #Trump administration doesn't understand how hard governing is - proper review didn't happen #HASC
#Petraeus says that #MuslimBan creates more bad guys than it takes off the streets. #HASC
.@AustinScottGA08 represents my hometown. Dangerously naive about #Russia. Need a moderate GOP challenger who isn't #Trump's flunky #HASC
.@AustinScottGA08 Seems to be playing apologist for #Russia in this hearing. Also says that #Putin doesn't want Assad to stay. LOL #HASC
.@nikiinthehouse points out that we need to avoid sending conflicting messages to our allies. #HASC #MuslimBan
#Petraeus, emphasizes need for #Muslim allies, quotes Churchill "only thing worse than fighting with allies is fighting without them" #HASC
#McLaughlin: Points out that lack of intel sharing among Europeans is one reason for #ISIS successes. #HASC
.@RepJoeCourtney discusses how #MuslimBan has made Iraqi prime minister's position precarious, could undermine Iraq's stability #HASC
#McLaughlin points out that #Russia has done joint exercises with #China in #SouthChinaSea #HASC
#McLaughlin: Says what #China has done in South China Sea is "indefensible" in terms of maritime law. #HASC
.@RepJoeCourtney emphasizes how lack of US participation in #UNCLOS emboldens China in South China Sea #HASC
#McLaughlin: Says that Asian allies are concerned about America's withdrawal from #TPP - fear they may be driven into #China's orbit #HASC
#Petraeus says that with #TPP being shelved, we need more efforts to strengthen Asian alliances. #HASC
#McLaughlin: Says that #Ukraine is the only nation that can change #Russia. If it can be thriving democracy, undermines #Putin #HASC
But #Petraeus says that firmness should not morph into provocation re: Russia. #HASC
#Petraeus emphasizes that we need to be "firm" with respect to the #Russians. Lauds #ERI.#HASC
#McLaughlin: We need to be clear and "firm" that we will not put up with aggression against #NATO from #Russia. #HASC
#Petraeus says that #MuslimBan keeps #Iraqi generals from coming to America to coordinate fight against #ISIS #HASC
#Petraeus says that despite centrifugal forces in #Iraq, central government's distribution of oil is powerful centripetal force #HASC
#McLaughlin: #Putin's aims - consolidate power in Russia, ensure Russia's freedom of action in surrounding countries. #HASC
.@RepAdamSmith Says he sees #Putin as "having clear plan" to push fascist leadership in other countries. #HASC
.@RepAdamSmith criticizes language around #MuslimBan from #Trump - is deeply damaging to relationship with allies against #ISIS #HASC
#Petraeus says that #Muslim allies are on "the front line" in the fight against #ISIS. #HASC
.@RepAdamSmith criticizes how #Bannon & @GenFlynn characterize #Muslims as the enemy - makes it harder to fight terror. #HASC #Petraeus
.@RepAdamSmith criticizes Bannon's views on Muslims, given that #Muslim allies are most important in fight against #ISIS. #HASC #Petraeus
#McLaughlin says we need ability to work well with other nations. Again, a dig at #Trump. #HASC #Petraeus
#McLaughlin says we are most influential nation, but can't solve problems on our own. Need partnerships. #HASC #Petraeus
#Petraeus discusses need to avoid #ThucydidesTrap when engaging with China. #HASC
#Petraeus says US needs relationship with #China that is based on mutual respect. We should shape world together, rather than clash #HASC
.@MacTXPress says pols need to do a better job of educating Americans on benefits of engaging with world. #HASC #Petraeus
#McLaughlin discusses revolution in energy markets - oversupply of oil. But we shouldn't pull back from Mid East. #HASC #Petraeus
#McLaughlin says that "deals with Russia will not come easily." Again, a subtle dig at @realDonaldTrump #HASC #Petraeus
#McLaughlin laments that our withdrawal from #TPP leaves vacuum that China will fill. #HASC
#McLaughlin criticizes how #Brexit has destabilized Europe, " our closest allies." Yet #Trump lauded Brexit. #HASC #Petraeus
#McLaughlin: The odds are high that N. Korea gets nuclear ICBM capability during this administration - maybe even this Congress. #HASC
#McLaughlin seems to be reciting the arguments of @tomfriedman in "Thank You for Being Late." #HASC
#McLaughlin: Success for us will center on our ability to manage alliances and build coalitions. #HASC #petraeus
#McLaughlin emphasizes that we need international rules to keep world from sliding into chaos. #HASC
#Petraeus highlights the threat that #Russia poses to international order. Counsels resolve in face of aggression. #HASC
#Petraeus says that we cannot take international order for granted. It can "fray and collapse." Trump should also remember that. #HASC
#Petraeus emphasizes that America's values as "free and open society" help us confront threats. We can recruit bright foreign minds #HASC
#Petraeus emphasizes that Islamic extremists want to portray war as "clash of civilizations." Subtle dig at #MuslimBan #HASC
#Petraeus emphasizes that most important allies against ISIS and AQ are the "vast majority of Muslims." Trump should remember that. #HASC
#Petraeus emphasizes that "relationship with China is the most important relationship in the world." Need to find balance, be nuanced. #HASC
#Petraeus Decries "the spiral of protectionism" that caused poverty in the 1930s. #HASC
.@RepAdamSmith emphasizes importance of alliances in countering threats. "Alarmed" about America First approach that distances allies #HASC
.@RepAdamSmith Points out that military size has decreased because we no longer have massive troop presence in Iraq & Afghan #HASC #petraeus
Watching #HASC hearing with #petraeus. Stay tuned for updates.
